## Pull data for select sensors for all 2019  

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(tc.sensors)
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
library(furrr)
library(tictoc) 

# pull sensor configuration and IDs
sensor_config <- pull_configuration()
sensor_ids <- pull_sensor_ids()

tic() # Start the timer

# set up parallel processing
future::plan(multisession)

# define date range
date_range <- seq(as.Date("2019/01/01"),
                  as.Date("2019/12/31"), by = "days")

# iterate through each sensor
sensor_data <- furrr::future_map_dfr(
  sensor_ids[[1]][633:640],
  function(x){
    
    # iterate through each date
    purrr::map_dfr(date_range,
                   function(d){
                     pull_sensor(
                       sensor = x,
                       pull_date = d
                     )
                   })
    
  })

tictoc::toc()

head(sensor_data)

```
